list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a short smoothbore gun for firing shells (technically called bombs) at high angles.
a cup-shaped receptacle made of hard material, in which ingredients are crushed or ground, used especially in cooking or pharmacy.
a mixture of lime with cement, sand, and water, used in building to bond bricks or stones.
attack or bombard with shells fired from a mortar.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the Commando positions were being heavily mortared
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các vị trí đặc công đã được vòm mạnh

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the pipe can be mortared in place
